mn50:2.4: garugaro viya → garu garu viya (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed ṭīkāyaṃ pāṭhantaraṃ); garugarutaro viya (sya-all)
mn50:4.7: jāneyya, kuto pana → kuto ca pana (sya-all)
mn50:9.5: evaṃ → etaṃ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed) | vidhurassa vidhuroteva → vidhurassa vidhuro vidhurotveva (bj, sya-all, km); vidhurassa vidhuro vidhuroteva (pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn50:11.6: sañjīvassa sañjīvoteva → sañjīvo sañjīvotveva (bj, sya-all, km); sañjīvo sañjīvoteva (pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn50:21.1: kumārakaṃ → kumāraṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | sīsaṃ vobhindi → sīsaṃ te bhindissāmīti (mr)
